keyMoments.title: Apis's Escape from Marine Ship
keyMoments.description: Apis breaks free from her captivity on a Marine Branch 8 ship during a rainstorm, incapacitating a guard and escaping onto a lifeboat.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of Apis and the inciting incident for the Warship Island Arc.

keyMoments.title: Rescued by the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates discover Apis unconscious on a small raft surrounded by seagulls and bring her aboard the Going Merry.
keyMoments.significance: Apis meets the protagonists who will help her throughout the arc.

keyMoments.title: Apis Introduces Herself
keyMoments.description: After waking up and initially panicking about being rescued by pirates, Apis calms down and introduces herself, revealing she's from Warship Island.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Apis's character and her destination, while showing her gradual trust in the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.quote: My name is Apis. I'm from Warship Island.

keyMoments.title: Apis Bonds with the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Throughout the episode, Apis overcomes her initial fear of pirates and begins to trust the Straw Hat crew, especially after experiencing their kindness.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Apis learning that pirates aren't all evil, establishing the theme of not judging by labels.
keyMoments.quote: You're not like other pirates... you're kind.

abilities.description: Via the Hiso Hiso no Mi, Apis can telepathically communicate with animals and understand their thoughts and feelings.

relationships.description: Apis initially fears Luffy because he's a pirate, but quickly comes to trust him and his crew after they rescue her and treat her kindly.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy rescues Apis from the ocean and welcomes her aboard the Going Merry.

relationships.description: Sanji immediately becomes protective of Apis, defending her privacy and preparing food for her.

evolutionMoments.description: Sanji defends Apis's right to keep her secrets and shows her kindness.

reveals.information: Apis is from Warship Island in the East Blue
Apis has eaten the Hiso Hiso no Mi, a Devil Fruit that allows her to communicate with animals
Apis was captured and held by Marine Branch 8

keyMoments.title: Nelson Royal's Introduction
keyMoments.description: The corrupt Commodore of Marine Branch 8 is introduced, an extremely obese officer who must be carried on a chair by six men. He orders his fleet to pursue and recapture Apis.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Nelson Royal as a secondary antagonist and reveals the Marines' interest in capturing Apis.
keyMoments.quote: Find that girl! I must have her!

keyMoments.title: Orders Fleet Pursuit
keyMoments.description: Nelson Royal spots the Going Merry with Apis aboard and orders his entire fleet to pursue and recapture her.
keyMoments.significance: Creates the central conflict that forces the Straw Hats to flee into the Calm Belt.
keyMoments.quote: The girl is on that ship! All ships, pursue!

relationships.description: Nelson Royal has hired the mercenary Eric to help him capture Apis and obtain the dragon for its supposed immortality powers.

evolutionMoments.description: Eric is shown working alongside Nelson Royal on the Marine flagship.

relationships.description: Nelson Royal obsessively pursues Apis to exploit her knowledge of the dragon for his own gain.

evolutionMoments.description: Nelson Royal orders his fleet to recapture Apis after she escapes.

reveals.information: Nelson Royal holds the unofficial rank of Teitoku (Commodore) in Marine Branch 8
Nelson Royal is extremely obese and must be carried on a chair by at least six men
Nelson Royal is pursuing Apis for reasons related to the dragon

keyMoments.title: Eric the Whirlwind's Introduction
keyMoments.description: The mercenary Eric is introduced aboard Nelson Royal's flagship, demonstrating his Kama Kama no Mi Devil Fruit ability which allows him to create razor-sharp wind slashes.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Eric as the primary antagonist of the Warship Island Arc with formidable Devil Fruit powers.

keyMoments.title: Watches Straw Hats Enter Calm Belt
keyMoments.description: Eric observes as the Straw Hats sail into the Calm Belt, commenting that they are as good as dead.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Eric's ruthless nature and sets up future confrontations.
keyMoments.quote: Those fools sailed right into the Calm Belt. They're as good as dead.

abilities.description: Using the Kama Kama no Mi, Eric can make his fingernails long and sharp, allowing him to release razor-sharp wind slashes that can cut through air and objects.

relationships.description: Eric works as a mercenary for Nelson Royal, though he has his own secret agenda and plans to betray him.

evolutionMoments.description: Eric is shown working with Nelson Royal aboard the Marine flagship.

reveals.information: Eric has eaten the Kama Kama no Mi, allowing him to create wind slashes with his sharp fingernails
Eric is a mercenary hired by Nelson Royal
Known as 'Eric the Whirlwind' due to his wind-based abilities
